title: Mac error can't download the game/ Log-in
body:
i delete the game as i cannot log in the game due to logs error now i can't even download the game because of logs error please help me as this is my 5th day almost *starting* please Riot help me :( 

*unspecified error please check the logs for more information* that's the error i aways get so i delete the game now trying to re-install i get the same error and i can't download the game :(

replies.body:
again in Terminal. 

Type telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 80

You should see something like

Trying 54.69.81.69...
Connected to ps-proxy-prod-68215633.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com.
Escape character is '^]'.

If you see the above message, then connectivity wise you can reach the support site. 



Next.. 
Type telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 443

You should see something similar to the first telnet


If you get timeout errors for any of the above telnet, then are some connectivity issues between you and our servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=UZtH81R5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-14T11:45:31.354+0000)
>
> again in Terminal. 
> 
> Type telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 80
> 
> You should see something like
> 
> Trying 54.69.81.69...
> Connected to ps-proxy-prod-68215633.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com.
> Escape character is '^]'.
> 
> If you see the above message, then connectivity wise you can reach the support site. 
> 
> 
> 
> Next.. 
> Type telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 443
> 
> You should see something similar to the first telnet
> 
> 
> If you get timeout errors for any of the above telnet, then are some connectivity issues between you and our servers.

Ishmeets-MacBook-Pro:~ ishmeetchadha$ telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 80
Trying 54.201.179.207...
Connected to ps-proxy-prod-68215633.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com.
Escape character is '^]'.
telnet support.leagueoflegends.com 443
HTTP/1.1 400 BAD_REQUEST
Content-Length: 0
Connection: Close

Connection closed by foreign host.
Ishmeets-MacBook-Pro:~ ishmeetchadha$ 




haha gotcha *Connection closed by foreign host* not my problem its definitely ur side problem how come thousands of players having same problem of course not our side problem and you can see its coz of this 

also i change the DNS as suggested by other page here is the link http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/wouH0bhH-lol-client-wont-open-macbook-please-help

a guy told me to do some changes as few people might able to start downloading the game but again when 260Mb left downloading speed is always 0kbps for some reason no 1 knows and others things works fine even though the internet is fine :/
seems like i don't feel for this game anymore just waste my time money over here n people not really helping :/

1. Open Terminal (in Applications->Utilities)
2. Type ping support.leagueoflegends.com
3. Paste output here

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=UZtH81R5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-14T02:33:44.289+0000)
>
> 1. Open Terminal (in Applications->Utilities)
> 2. Type ping support.leagueoflegends.com
> 3. Paste output here

PING ps-proxy-prod-68215633.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com (54.201.179.207): 56 data bytes
Request timeout for icmp_seq 0
Request timeout for icmp_seq 1
Request timeout for icmp_seq 2
Request timeout for icmp_seq 3
Request timeout for icmp_seq 4
Request timeout for icmp_seq 5
Request timeout for icmp_seq 6
Request timeout for icmp_seq 7
Request timeout for icmp_seq 8
Request timeout for icmp_seq 9
Request timeout for icmp_seq 10



thats what its coming @@

Same problem here.. when I do the ping support thing this is what I get:

PING ps-proxy-prod-68215633.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com (54.69.81.69): 56 data bytes
Request timeout for icmp_seq 0

and this timeout message goes forever.. please help
That sounds like a DNS issue. Can you try to ping support.leagueoflegends.com from your computer? does it resolve to an IP?

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=UZtH81R5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-14T02:04:58.716+0000)
>
> That sounds like a DNS issue. Can you try to ping support.leagueoflegends.com from your computer? does it resolve to an IP?

i don't know how to do it from mac :/

Best way to get help for this is to contact player support.

http://support.leagueoflegends.com/

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=UZtH81R5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-13T23:29:57.961+0000)
>
> Best way to get help for this is to contact player support.
> 
> http://support.leagueoflegends.com/

the problem is, the link you provide is not even working from my Mac i have to do it from internet cafe & i did complain but haven't got any reply from them :/ ... also cannot open many pages of lol idk why just LoL rest things for daily use my internet is fine but when it comes to here to much stuff already talk to my TPG they say there is no problem from their side :/
